definition: absolutely true (idiom)/manifold/true from many points of view
variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]

sentences.english: It is quit true that "nothing is ventured, nothing is gained".
sentences.chinese: “不入虎穴，焉得虎子”这句话说得千真万确。

sentences.english: I'm gonna getcha. It's a matter of fact.
sentences.chinese: 我要得到你，这是千真万确的。

sentences.english: I know it is true from you.
sentences.chinese: 从你身上，我知道这是千真万确的。

sentences.english: HERODIAS: Thou knowest well that it is true.
sentences.chinese: 你心知肚明，那千真万确。
珀利阿斯的预言千真万确。

sentences.english: Have we really had a moment when warm spring waves surged through our heart?
sentences.chinese: 千真万确地，我们有那么一刻内心深处陡卷温暖春潮？

sentences.english: It' true, lutefisk is more popular in the United States than in Norway.
sentences.chinese: 千真万确，卤特非食在美国比在挪威更受欢迎。

sentences.english: I can attest to the absolute truth of his statement.
sentences.chinese: 我可以证实他的话是千真万确的。

sentences.english: Freeman is dead right, of course.
sentences.chinese: 千真万确，弗里曼是正确的。

sentences.english: I repeat that I recognize him perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 我再说一遍，我千真万确地认识他。

sentences.english: I know, hard to believe, but true.
sentences.chinese: 尽管难以置信，但却是千真万确的。

sentences.english: We are in love, and it's true love, it's verifiable.
sentences.chinese: 我们是相爱的，千真万确，天地可鉴。

sentences.english: “It’s true, young people wear old-fashioned hats, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “千真万确，年轻人戴旧式帽子了，”他说。

definition: to speak without thinking/to blurt sth out
to arbitrarily assert/to allege/to stick to one's statement/to cling to one's view
mere verbal statement cannot be taken as proof (idiom)
replacement guaranteed if not genuine/fig. authentic
lit. to chop the nail and slice the iron (idiom)/fig. resolute and decisive/unhesitating/categorical
to believe firmly without any doubt (idiom)/absolute certainty about sth
